00089     struct VehPosition : public std::binary_function < const MSVehicle*,
00090             SUMOReal, bool > {
00092         bool operator()(const MSVehicle* cmp, SUMOReal pos) const {
00093             return cmp->getPositionOnLane() >= pos;
00094         }
00095     };

00732     class vehicle_position_sorter {
00733     public:
00735         explicit vehicle_position_sorter() { }
00736 
00737 
00743         int operator()(MSVehicle* v1, MSVehicle* v2) const {
00744             return v1->getPositionOnLane() > v2->getPositionOnLane();
00745         }
00746 
00747     };
00748 
00752     class by_connections_to_sorter {
00753     public:
00755         explicit by_connections_to_sorter(const MSEdge* const e)
00756             : myEdge(e), myLaneDir(e->getLanes()[0]->getShape().getBegLine().atan2PositiveAngle()) { }
00757 
00759         int operator()(const MSEdge* const e1, const MSEdge* const e2) const {
00760             const std::vector<MSLane*>* ae1 = e1->allowedLanes(*myEdge);
00761             const std::vector<MSLane*>* ae2 = e2->allowedLanes(*myEdge);
00762             SUMOReal s1 = 0;
00763             if (ae1 != 0 && ae1->size() != 0) {
00764                 s1 = (SUMOReal) ae1->size() + GeomHelper::getMinAngleDiff((*ae1)[0]->getShape().getBegLine().atan2PositiveAngle(), myLaneDir) / PI / 2.;
00765             }
00766             SUMOReal s2 = 0;
00767             if (ae2 != 0 && ae2->size() != 0) {
00768                 s2 = (SUMOReal) ae2->size() + GeomHelper::getMinAngleDiff((*ae2)[0]->getShape().getBegLine().atan2PositiveAngle(), myLaneDir) / PI / 2.;
00769             }
00770             return s1 < s2;
00771         }
00772 
00773     private:
00774         by_connections_to_sorter& operator=(const by_connections_to_sorter&); // just to avoid a compiler warning
00775     private:
00776         const MSEdge* const myEdge;
00777         SUMOReal myLaneDir;
00778     };
00779 
00783     class edge_finder {
00784     public:
00785         edge_finder(MSEdge* e) : myEdge(e) {}
00786         bool operator()(const IncomingLaneInfo& ili) const {
00787             return &(ili.lane->getEdge()) == myEdge;
00788         }
00789     private:
00790         edge_finder& operator=(const edge_finder&); // just to avoid a compiler warning
00791     private:
00792         const MSEdge* const myEdge;
00793     public:
00794         double getMySlope() const;
00795         void setMySlope(double mySlope);
00796     };
00797
